install:
-- start of table ithink_journal_type
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ithink_journal_type;
CREATE TABLE `ithink_journal_type` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '类型名称',
  `order` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序',
  `remark` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '备注',
  `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '0:禁用, 1:正常, 2:已删除',
  `del_time` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除时间',
  `time` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=8 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='稿件类型表';
INSERT INTO `ithink_journal_type` (`id` , `name` , `order` , `remark` , `status` , `del_time` , `time`) VALUES ( 1,\'普刊\',99,\'\',1,0,1534920902 ) , ( 2,\'学报\',99,\'\',1,0,1534920952 ) , ( 3,\'课题\',98,\'\',1,0,1534921013 ) , ( 4,\'专利\',99,\'\',1,0,1535017093 ) , ( 5,\'核心\',99,\'\',1,0,1535684432 ) , ( 6,\'专著\',99,\'\',1,0,1535684470 ) , ( 7,\'挂名\',99,\'\',1,0,1535684482 )
-- end of table ithink_journal_type



-- start of table ithink_doc_attachment
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ithink_doc_attachment;
CREATE TABLE `ithink_doc_attachment` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `doc_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'doc_id',
  `file_name` char(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '文件原名',
  `path` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '附件路径',
  `order` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序',
  `remark` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '备注',
  `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0:禁用, 1:正常, 2:已删除',
  `del_time` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除时间',
  `time` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='附件表';
-- ithink_doc_attachment 表没有需要插入的数据
-- end of table ithink_doc_attachment



-- start of table ithink_doc
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ithink_doc;
CREATE TABLE `ithink_doc` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` char(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题',
  `file_name` char(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '文件上传名字',
  `is_confirm` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '上传者是否确定信息 0未确定，1已确定',
  `arrange_time` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '安排时间',
  `author` char(12) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '作者',
  `year` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '年份',
  `month` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '月份',
  `path` char(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '保存路径',
  `ext` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '后缀',
  `uid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '上传用户id',
  `hash` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '文件hash',
  `page` decimal(3,1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.0' COMMENT '文档p数',
  `journal_name` char(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '刊物名',
  `journal_type` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '刊物类型',
  `doc_type` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '稿件类型 2自由稿，1组织稿',
  `is_pending` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '是否待处理',
  `doc_status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '稿件状态 0:待定, 1:录用, 2:修改, 3:转到, 4:退款',
  `order` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序',
  `remark` text NOT NULL COMMENT '采编备注',
  `remark_editor` text NOT NULL COMMENT '编辑备注',
  `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '0:禁用, 1:正常, 2:已删除',
  `del_time` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除时间',
  `time` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '文件上传时间',
  `deposit` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '定金',
  `final_payment` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '尾款',
  `address_id` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '邮寄地址',
  `total` decimal(10,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '总额',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='稿件表';
INSERT INTO `ithink_doc` (`id` , `title` , `file_name` , `is_confirm` , `arrange_time` , `author` , `year` , `month` , `path` , `ext` , `uid` , `hash` , `page` , `journal_name` , `journal_type` , `doc_type` , `is_pending` , `doc_status` , `order` , `remark` , `remark_editor` , `status` , `del_time` , `time` , `deposit` , `final_payment` , `address_id` , `total`) VALUES ( 4,\'群众文化活动的特点解读\',\'1P--熊艳红--群众文化活动的特点解读.docx\',0,0,\'熊艳红\',0,0,\'20181102\\\\abc77a4c58639a8b977fa1fd90e26b25.docx\',\'docx\',1,\'22cb11acf871f38e63132563e2407733\',\'1.0\',\'\',0,0,0,0,0,\'\',\'\',2,1541125003,1541124920,\'0.00\',\'0.00\',0,\'0.00\' )
-- end of table ithink_doc



-- start of table ithink_address
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ithink_address;
CREATE TABLE `ithink_address` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '收件人',
  `tel` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '联系电话',
  `user_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '代理id',
  `province_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '省id',
  `city_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '市id',
  `county_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '县id',
  `address` text COMMENT '详细地址',
  `remark` text NOT NULL COMMENT '备注',
  `status` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '0:禁用, 1:正常, 2:已删除',
  `del_time` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '删除时间',
  `time` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='通用区域联动表';
INSERT INTO `ithink_address` (`id` , `name` , `tel` , `user_id` , `province_id` , `city_id` , `county_id` , `address` , `remark` , `status` , `del_time` , `time`) VALUES ( 1,\'联系\',\'13322562235\',4,4,58,564,\'详细地址\',\'\',1,0,1540536117 ) , ( 2,\'联系人\',\'13322562235\',4,6,81,752,\'联系人联系人\',\'\',1,0,1540536136 )
-- end of table ithink_address
